Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Columbus in 1974...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1975, off Mark Almaraz (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1975, off Jaime Harper (Mal)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1975...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Wisconsin on 8/1/1977...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...

Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1984, hitting .593 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
